title: World Series: Catches by Chas McCormick and Trey Mancini Saved Game 5 for Astros
description: Chas McCormick grew up near Philadelphia in a family of Phillies fans, but his catch at the wall in Game 5 has Houston one win away from a World Series title.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Chas McCormick, who made a terrific catch at the wall in center field in the ninth inning, took a moment to celebrate after the win.
